p: Our drag coefficient for Mo is lower than the MD-simulation value of ∼0.078 mPas for edge dislocations reported in [ 65]. Similarly, our drag coefficient for Ni is lower than the MD-simulation results of 0.0321 mPas for edge dislocations reported in [ 65], and ∼0.015 mPas for edge dislocations reported in [ 8, 12, 66], albeit close to the latter.
